  • Method Details

    • run

      public void run() throws InterruptedException, IOException
      Runs the server, handling the game flow and player connections. Starts the Socket and RMI servers, then loads game progress from a JSON file if available, or proceeds with the regular join process. Waits for all players to connect and the game to start. Enters the game loop, where players take turns until the game ends. Handles disconnections and skips turns of disconnected players, handles the end of the game and performs cleanup operations.
      Throws:
      InterruptedException - If the execution is interrupted while waiting.
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs.

    • onePlayerLeftTimeout

      private void onePlayerLeftTimeout()
      Runs a thread that waits until notified by a notifyLobbyDisconnection. When only one player remains, waits for a timeout and ends the game if no one connects.

    • addPlayerToRecord

      public void addPlayerToRecord(String nickname, Server.connectionType conn)

    • chatMessage

      public void chatMessage(String sender, String text, String receiver, Boolean pm)
      this method is used to send chat messages to every RMI and Socket client. It's called by serverRMI.chatMessage() and serverSock.sendChatMessageToClient(), if the receiver is "all" then the message passed in parameter "text" will be sent to all the clients but the one who wrote it. If the receiver parameter is a player in the game the message will be sent to that player by calling either serverRMI.chatMessage() or serverSock.sendChatMessageToClient(). The Boolean pm (private message) will be used to print either MESSAGE FROM *nick receiver* if pm is false or MESSAGE FROM *nick receiver* TO YOU otherwise. If the receiver parameter is a nickname of a player not present in the game the message will simply be ignored.
      Parameters:
      sender - nickname of the player who sends the message
      text - body of the message
      receiver - nickname of the player to whom the chat message is destined (all if the message is for everybody)
      pm - Private message, true if the message is destined to one player only

    • notifySocketOfTurnEnd

      public void notifySocketOfTurnEnd()
      sends Socket client the name of the current player

    • isEveryoneConnected

      public boolean isEveryoneConnected()

    • notifyLobbyDisconnection

      public void notifyLobbyDisconnection(String nickOfDisconnectedPlayer)
      Notifies all clients that a player has disconnected. Notifies all threads waiting on this (onePlayerLeftTimout() and run() wait for it).
      Parameters:
      nickOfDisconnectedPlayer - the nickname of the player that disconnected

    • notifyGameHasBeenCreated

      public void notifyGameHasBeenCreated() throws RemoteException
      Used to notify serverSock, serverRMI and server that a game has been created
      Throws:
      RemoteException

    • joinGame

      public void joinGame()
      This method is called by run() whenever a saved game GameProgress.json is not present. It's used to launch the respective method joinGame of ServerRMI and ServerSock in a specific order to avoid more than one player creating a new game at the same time. While the match type isn't chosen yet, the respective joinGame() is called for the first client in clientsLobby, if that client disconnects then it will be removed from clientsLobby and therefore clientsLobby.get(0) is now different from the old clientsLobby.get(0) and so joinGame() will be now executed for the new one. Whenever the match type is selected this method will call joinGame() for the rest of the clients in clientsLobby

    • broadcastMessage

      public void broadcastMessage(String message, String sender)
      This method is used to send a message to all RMI and socket clients except the sender of that message
      Parameters:
      message - - message to broadcast
      sender - - nickname of the player that broadcasts the message

    • numberOfPlayersLeft

      public int numberOfPlayersLeft()
      Returns:
      number of players in the game which have the boolean disconnected set to false in the ArrayList of ClientInfoStruct clientsLobby

    • notifyServer

      public void notifyServer()
      notifies all the thread waiting on this

    • removeFromClientsLobby

      public void removeFromClientsLobby(String nickname)
      removes a ClientInfoStruct object from the ArrayList clientInfoStruct if an object with this nickname exists
      Parameters:
      nickname - - nickname of a player that needs to be removed from clientsLobby
